title: Basic Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program through Active Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts at the Secondary School Level
context.additional_context: A course optimized for collaborative learning environments using digital devices, with a focus on mathematical modeling for real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve real-world problems by applying various mathematical concepts to project-based tasks.
Learners can improve their mathematical problem-solving strategies by incorporating peer feedback in collaborative learning activities.
Learners can visualize and analyze mathematical concepts using digital tools such as GeoGebra, Desmos, etc.
Learners will achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate on the foundational mathematics assessment (functions, calculus, probability) upon completion of the 6-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
